definition[0]: to take parts of one machine to use in another, for example to repair it
example[0]: The truck was cannibalized for parts.
definition[1]: if one of a company’s products cannibalizes another, it takes sales away from it
definition[2]: if one of a company’s new products cannibalizes an older one, it takes sales away from it
example[1]: Healthy Choice was a best seller without cannibalizing sales of its other frozen food brands.
definition[3]: to take parts from one machine to use in another, for example to repair it
example[2]: By the time the replacement part arrived, the helicopter had been cannibalized for spare parts.
